name: Pinball Overlord
description:
You are the terrible Dark Lord, and to break the routine you decide to go to the magical forest to collect the bones of the armed troops in the area using your evil spells to increase your terrible powers, in a unique experience that unites pinball and RPG.

Immerse yourself in a medieval fantasy world all in Pixel Art supported by dynamic musical themes on 8-bit synths that highlight the game's energetic gameplay.

Fight against different types of enemies by linking fights in a challenging experience where each part is different but where your precision and reflexes will be put to the test.

-------------------

Realize on the occasion of a 7-day JAM (organized by our school ICAN Design) by :

Nathan Lebocq  - Game & Level Design
Luigi De Angelis - Artistic Direction and Programming
Valentin Razac - Sound & Game Design
Jonas Martin - Programming  & Game Design
Damien Saenz (Behance) - Artistic Direction  & Level Design
